  • Package de.jhh4.gui

    • Class de.jhh4.gui.ButtonForMap

      class ButtonForMap extends JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • active
          boolean active
          is this currently clickable (not used)
        • image
          Image image
          the image to be displayed
        • klickListener
          ActionListener klickListener
          decides what the button does when clicked
        • pieceMover
          PieceMover pieceMover
          needed to call the action() method on the actionListeners
        • tile
          Tile tile
          the tile which this button represents

      class MainWindow extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cardLayout
          CardLayout cardLayout

          Credits credits
